description: Try this divine gluten-free crumble that features sweet strawberries, cinnamon, vanilla, maple syrup and crunchy flaked almonds.
keywords: Crumble,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Egg free,Aug 2021,Sesame free,Baking,Strawberry,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Gluten-Free Strawberry Crumble Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180°C/160°C fan-forced. Place vanilla, syrup and strawberries in a 1.5L ovenproof dish, tossing gently to coat.
Place flour and butter in a medium bowl. Using fingertips, rub in butter until coarse crumbs form. Stir in coconut, almonds and cinnamon. Sprinkle over strawberry mixture.
Bake for 40 minutes or until mixture is bubbling and crumble is golden. Stand to cool for 5 minutes. Serve topped with yoghurt.
